name: toolbar-demo
description: Vanilla JavaScript example using Vite for the Headless WordPress Toolbar

scripts.example:build: npm run example:dev:install && npm run wp:start && npm run example:start
scripts.example:start: node scripts/setup-env.js && npm run wp:ensure && concurrently "npm run wp:start" "sleep 5 && npm run example:dev"
scripts.example:prune: wp-env destroy && npm run example:build && npm run example:start

author: hwptoolkit
